channel.title: PNGCrush - Compress your .PNG files to 1/4 of the size and keep the quality!
channel.description:
PNGCrush: http://pmt.sourceforge.net/pngcrush/
You absolutely have to try this program! It's simply amazing! I was referred to it by a few of my friends and it's just great. I have had such a problem with saving files to a .png format and then getting exorbitant sizes like 55 KB, 120 KB, and many higher sizes when just making screen shots!
This program compresses .PNGs more than PNGOut, if you've heard of that program.
If you're into images like a lot of people on this forum, then just try it out and save some of the people that still use dial-up and save the people who host your images. :D
~Ron

Should I put this in the Images section? When Mr. Chris sees this, I know he will love it.
